# Builder Timer App - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Flutter app for tracking multiple Clash of Clans builder timers with local notifications.

## Key Features
- Track 5 builders with individual timers
- Custom work names for each builder
- Local notifications when timers complete
- Background notification support
- Data persistence

## Status
- [x] Created copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Scaffolded Flutter project
- [x] Customized with timer functionality
- [x] Added notification support
- [x] Added data persistence
- [x] Compiled successfully
